resources.string:
Atlantis
Selecting this menu option (if available) will launch the Atlantis configuration view, where you can turn Atlantis on and off and configure other features of it, like recording state and which configuration to use.

 Get Real
Pressing this button will trigger a request that doesn't have a corresponding mock request configuration. It will allow Atlantis to fallback to the "fallbackBaseUrl" and do a real network request.

 Get Mocked
Pressing this button will trigger a request that has a mocked response configuration. Atlantis will return the mocked content and won't even try to reach the real target url.
How to use the Sample app
